channel.title: CVE Feed for Ubuntu -- Whoopsie
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ubuntu -- Whoopsie

item.title: CVE-2019-11476|2024-09-16T19:15:47.644Z -- ubuntu -- whoopsie
item.description: An integer overflow in whoopsie before versions 0.2.52.5ubuntu0.1, 0.2.62ubuntu0.1, 0.2.64ubuntu0.1, 0.2.66, results in an out-of-bounds write to a heap allocated buffer when processing large crash dumps. This results in a crash or possible code-execution in the context of the whoopsie process.
